title: Two brothers gunned down near Kandhkot - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
SUKKUR: Armed motorcyclists gunned down two real brothers in front of their family members in 27-Mile area near Kandhkot on Thursday.

The brothers, Hanif Naseerani and Rahim Dad Naseerani, who lived in a village in RD-109 area on the Sindh-Balochistan border, had traveled to Kandhkot on two motorcycles along with their women.

When they were going back to their village, they were ambushed and killed at the 27-Mile by unidentified armed motorcyclists, said police officials.

They said that police shifted the bodies to Kandhkot Civil Hospital. Police were investigating the motive behind the double murder.

Published in Dawn, August 8th, 2025
